none: 山形県六椹八幡宮の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Rokusan Hachiman Shrine, Yamagata (Original)

六椹八幡宮様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、感謝申し上げます。 表示 - 非営利 4.0 国際： https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank Rokusan Hachiman Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.  CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
